page.title: 11New use for old mills
page.content: Casey's Camping started their business in 1983 and sell a range of camping equipment. The building which they work in was built in 1877. There are five floors and only the one in use. Around the mill there are several other industrial buildings which include an engineering company, a foam company, and a furniture and carpet warehouse. Next to Casey's Camping there used to be a 190 ft. chimney which has been knocked down. At the back of the mill there used to be a lodge which is now a car park for the industrial estate.
